title: My First Blog Post
excerpt: This is a quick summary of my first post where I discuss the fundamental values of digital inclusion.
content: Digital accessibility is the cornerstone of a truly inclusive society. By ensuring that our websites and applications are usable by everyone, regardless of ability, we open doors to education, employment, and social connection.

title: How I Built This App
excerpt: A look behind the scenes of my AI project and how Gemini powers the accessibility consultation tool.
content:
I used Gemini and AI Studio to create a highly accessible search tool. This project combines modern web technologies with advanced AI to provide real-time assistance to those navigating digital barriers.

The integration of the Gemini API allows for empathetic and accurate responses to complex accessibility queries, making specialized knowledge more accessible to the general public.

title: The Future of Voice UI
excerpt: Exploring the next frontier of human-computer interaction through natural language and the Live API.
content:
Voice User Interfaces (VUIs) are evolving rapidly. With the advent of multi-modal models like Gemini, the conversation between humans and machines is becoming more fluid and natural than ever before.

For users with visual or motor impairments, these advances aren't just convenientâ€”they are life-changing, providing hands-free access to information and services that were previously cumbersome to navigate.
